metadata.title: Recombinant Protein-Based Assays for Detection of Antibodies to Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus Spike and Nucleocapsid Proteins á°” Downloaded from

abstract.original_text: Recombinant severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) nucleocapsid and spike protein-based immunoglobulin G immunoassays were developed and evaluated. Our assays demonstrated high sensitivity and specificity to the SARS coronavirus in sera collected from patients as late as 2 years postonset of symptoms. These assays will be useful not only for routine SARS coronavirus diagnostics but also for epidemiological and antibody kinetic studies.

sentences.segment_text: Recombinant severe acute respiratory syndrome ( SARS ) nucleocapsid and spike protein-based immunoglobulin G immunoassays were developed and evaluated .
Our assays demonstrated high sensitivity and specificity to the SARS coronavirus in sera collected from patients as late as 2 years postonset of symptoms .
These assays will be useful not only for routine SARS coronavirus diagnostics but also for epidemiological and antibody kinetic studies .
